Name: OLI_APPLICABILITY_POS
Definition: Known to apply. Same as a YES response to a question.

Name: OLI_APPLICABILITY_NEG
Definition: Does not apply. Same as a NO response to a question.

Name: OLI_APPLICABILITY_UNKNOWN
Definition: May or may not apply. This status is slightly different than "Unknown." If a question was asked and not answered - or if a question was never asked, then the Applicability Response is "Unknown." Use OLI_UNKNOWN (NOT this code) in this case. However, if a question was asked, and a the response provided is "Unknown" (or some equivalent), then the answer is known and modeled using this code value.
